title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible API).

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that talks to a local Ollama instance via the ollama-js client.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous and asynchronous APIs, built with Retrofit.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, and manage models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams responses from local Ollama models into any channel.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards messages to Ollama and posts streaming replies back.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to generate summaries, rewrite notes, or answer questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package on PyPI; install via pip and interact with Ollama servers from any Python script.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain for private docs.

title: ollama-sd
summary: Experimental Ollama plugin for Stable-Diffusion-WebUI enabling prompt generation or captioning via local LLMs.
